title: Relates to certification as a clinical nurse specialist (CNS)
summary: Relates to certification as a clinical nurse specialist (CNS).
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          522

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. KRUEGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Higher Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation  to  certification  as  a
         clinical nurse specialist (CNS)

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The education law is amended by adding a new  section  6911
    2  to read as follows:
    3    S  6911.  CERTIFICATION  AS A CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST (CNS).  1. FOR
    4  ISSUANCE OF A LICENSE TO PRACTICE AS A CLINICAL NURSE  SPECIALIST  UNDER
    5  SECTION  SIX  THOUSAND  NINE  HUNDRED TWO OF THIS ARTICLE, THE APPLICANT
    6  SHALL FULFILL THE FOLLOWING REQUIREMENTS:
    7    (A) FILE AN APPLICATION WITH THE DEPARTMENT;
    8    (B) BE LICENSED AS A REGISTERED PROFESSIONAL NURSE IN THIS STATE;
    9    (C) (I) HAVE SATISFACTORILY COMPLETED AN  EDUCATIONAL  PROGRAM  REGIS-
   10  TERED  BY  THE  DEPARTMENT INCLUDING A MASTER'S OR DOCTORAL DEGREE, OR A
   11  POST-MASTER'S CERTIFICATE FROM A PROGRAM ACCEPTABLE  TO  THE  DEPARTMENT
   12  WHICH  PREPARES GRADUATES TO PRACTICE AS CNSS AND WHICH IS ACCREDITED BY
   13  A NATIONAL NURSING ACCREDITED BODY ACCEPTABLE TO  THE  STATE  BOARD  FOR
   14  NURSING,  AND  (II)  MEETS  ALL  OTHER  REQUIREMENTS  ESTABLISHED BY THE
   15  DEPARTMENT TO PRACTICE AS A  CLINICAL  NURSE  SPECIALIST  INCLUDING  THE
   16  PASSAGE OF A NATIONALLY RECOGNIZED EXAMINATION ACCEPTABLE TO THE DEPART-
   17  MENT,  OR  (III) HAVE RECEIVED EDUCATIONAL PREPARATION DETERMINED BY THE
   18  DEPARTMENT TO BE THE SUBSTANTIAL EQUIVALENT  OF  SUBPARAGRAPHS  (I)  AND
   19  (II) OF THIS PARAGRAPH; AND
   20    (D)  PAY  A  FEE  TO  THE DEPARTMENT OF FIFTY DOLLARS FOR EACH INITIAL
   21  CERTIFICATE AUTHORIZING CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST PRACTICE AND A  TRIEN-
   22  NIAL REGISTRATION FEE OF THIRTY DOLLARS. REGISTRATION UNDER THIS SECTION
   23  SHALL  BE  COTERMINOUS WITH THE CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST'S REGISTRATION
   24  AS A PROFESSIONAL NURSE.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00726-01-1

       S. 522                              2

    1    2. ONLY A PERSON CERTIFIED UNDER THIS  SECTION  SHALL  USE  THE  TITLE
    2  "CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST" OR THE DESIGNATION "CNS".
    3    3.  THIS SECTION SHALL NOT APPLY TO ANY PERSON WHO IS CURRENTLY CERTI-
    4  FIED AND PRACTICING AS A CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST OR WHO IS ELIGIBLE TO
    5  TAKE A NATIONAL CERTIFYING EXAM ACCEPTABLE TO THE DEPARTMENT FOR CERTIF-
    6  ICATION AS A CLINICAL NURSE SPECIALIST WHEN THIS SECTION TAKES EFFECT.
    7    S 2. The provisions of this act shall not apply to any act or practice
    8  authorized by any other law,  rule,  regulation  or  certification.  The
    9  provisions  of  this  act  shall  not  apply to any activity authorized,
   10  pursuant to statute, rule or regulation, to be performed by a registered
   11  professional nurse in a hospital as defined in article  twenty-eight  of
   12  the public health law.
   13    S  3.  The  commissioner  of education is authorized to promulgate all
   14  rules and regulations necessary for the implementation of this act.
   15    S 4. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   16  it shall have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to certification as a clinical nurse specialist (CNS)
